trans-unit.source: The Age ratings page of the App submission process lets you provide information about your app so it can receive the appropriate age ratings from the International Age Ratings Coalition (IARC).
trans-unit.target: The Age ratings page of the App submission process lets you provide information about your app so it can receive the appropriate age ratings from the International Age Ratings Coalition (IARC).

trans-unit.source: Age ratings
trans-unit.target: Age ratings

trans-unit.source: Age ratings
trans-unit.target: Age ratings

trans-unit.source: The **Age ratings** page of the [App submission process](app-submissions.md) lets you provide information about your app so it can receive the appropriate age ratings from the [International Age Ratings Coalition (IARC)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=716854).
trans-unit.target: The **Age ratings** page of the [App submission process](app-submissions.md) lets you provide information about your app so it can receive the appropriate age ratings from the [International Age Ratings Coalition (IARC)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=716854).

trans-unit.source: These ratings are about the suitability of the content in the app and its metadata, rather than the age of the target audience for your app.
trans-unit.target: These ratings are about the suitability of the content in the app and its metadata, rather than the age of the target audience for your app.

trans-unit.source: Answering the age ratings questionnaire
trans-unit.target: Answering the age ratings questionnaire

trans-unit.source: The first time you submit an app (or the first time you update an app that was published using the older age rating process), you will be prompted to take a multiple-choice questionnaire to determine your app’s age rating.
trans-unit.target: The first time you submit an app (or the first time you update an app that was published using the older age rating process), you will be prompted to take a multiple-choice questionnaire to determine your app’s age rating.

trans-unit.source: **Important** If you have already taken the questionnaire for your app in another storefront and have an IARC rating ID, you can select the option to provide us with your rating ID.
trans-unit.target: **Important** If you have already taken the questionnaire for your app in another storefront and have an IARC rating ID, you can select the option to provide us with your rating ID.

trans-unit.source: We'll use your ID to associate the existing ratings with your app in the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: We'll use your ID to associate the existing ratings with your app in the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: You are required to answer the questions accurately.
trans-unit.target: You are required to answer the questions accurately.

trans-unit.source: As part of this process, we share your publisher display name and email address with IARC.
trans-unit.target: As part of this process, we share your publisher display name and email address with IARC.

trans-unit.source: After you complete the questionnaire, IARC will assign age ratings based on your responses.
trans-unit.target: After you complete the questionnaire, IARC will assign age ratings based on your responses.

trans-unit.source: We’ll use these ratings when displaying your app to customers in different markets.
trans-unit.target: We’ll use these ratings when displaying your app to customers in different markets.

trans-unit.source: You will also receive an email from IARC with info about the app’s ratings.
trans-unit.target: You will also receive an email from IARC with info about the app’s ratings.

trans-unit.source: The first question asks you to choose the category that best describes your app (and its metadata).
trans-unit.target: The first question asks you to choose the category that best describes your app (and its metadata).

trans-unit.source: Once you make a selection, you will see additional questions.
trans-unit.target: Once you make a selection, you will see additional questions.

trans-unit.source: The specific questions you see will vary based on your previous answers.
trans-unit.target: The specific questions you see will vary based on your previous answers.

trans-unit.source: If you make a mistake, you can start the questionnaire again to provide the right answers.
trans-unit.target: If you make a mistake, you can start the questionnaire again to provide the right answers.

trans-unit.source: When you have completed answering the questions, click **Save and generate**.
trans-unit.target: When you have completed answering the questions, click **Save and generate**.

trans-unit.source: You’ll then see all of the app’s assigned ratings, and can continue with your submission.
trans-unit.target: You’ll then see all of the app’s assigned ratings, and can continue with your submission.

trans-unit.source: You can also click **Edit** to retake the questionnaire.
trans-unit.target: You can also click **Edit** to retake the questionnaire.

trans-unit.source: The next time you update your app, you’ll see all of the app’s assigned ratings on this page.
trans-unit.target: The next time you update your app, you’ll see all of the app’s assigned ratings on this page.

trans-unit.source: You can also click **Edit** if you want to retake the questionnaire.
trans-unit.target: You can also click **Edit** if you want to retake the questionnaire.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to retake the questionnaire if the content of your app has changed in a way that requires you to adjust any of your answers.
trans-unit.target: Be sure to retake the questionnaire if the content of your app has changed in a way that requires you to adjust any of your answers.

trans-unit.source: IARC may also update the questions from time to time.
trans-unit.target: IARC may also update the questions from time to time.

trans-unit.source: If this happens, you may be prompted to retake the questionnaire when you submit an update.
trans-unit.target: If this happens, you may be prompted to retake the questionnaire when you submit an update.

trans-unit.source: **Note** South Korean law requires games made available in South Korea to be rated through the South Korea [Game Rating Board](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=228256).
trans-unit.target: **Note** South Korean law requires games made available in South Korea to be rated through the South Korea [Game Rating Board](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=228256).

trans-unit.source: If your app is a game, and if you want to offer it in South Korea, you must fill out this additional section and upload your rating certificate.
trans-unit.target: If your app is a game, and if you want to offer it in South Korea, you must fill out this additional section and upload your rating certificate.

trans-unit.source: Note that if your app is not a game, or if you don't want to offer it in South Korea, you can leave this section blank.
trans-unit.target: Note that if your app is not a game, or if you don't want to offer it in South Korea, you can leave this section blank.

trans-unit.source: Appealing ratings or refused classifications
trans-unit.target: Appealing ratings or refused classifications

trans-unit.source: If you have questions about the age ratings your app received, or wish to appeal them, you can contact IARC via the link that appears in the rating certificate email that you will receive after your app has been published.
trans-unit.target: If you have questions about the age ratings your app received, or wish to appeal them, you can contact IARC via the link that appears in the rating certificate email that you will receive after your app has been published.

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the rating for your app may cause it to be classified as inappropriate for a particular country or region.
trans-unit.target: In some cases, the rating for your app may cause it to be classified as inappropriate for a particular country or region.

trans-unit.source: If this occurs, you will see a message indicating the market(s) to which your app can’t be offered.
trans-unit.target: If this occurs, you will see a message indicating the market(s) to which your app can’t be offered.

trans-unit.source: If you disagree with this classification, you can request an appeal using the link that appears in the rating certificate email that you will receive from IARC.
trans-unit.target: If you disagree with this classification, you can request an appeal using the link that appears in the rating certificate email that you will receive from IARC.

trans-unit.source: Previous Windows Store age ratings
trans-unit.target: Previous Windows Store age ratings

trans-unit.source: Previously, developers specified the age rating for their app rather than answer the questionnaire.
trans-unit.target: Previously, developers specified the age rating for their app rather than answer the questionnaire.

trans-unit.source: Below, find the previous Windows Store age ratings breakdown:
trans-unit.target: Below, find the previous Windows Store age ratings breakdown:

trans-unit.source: Age rating
trans-unit.target: Age rating

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: 3+ (Suitable for young children)
trans-unit.target: 3+ (Suitable for young children)

trans-unit.source: These apps contain content suitable for young children.
trans-unit.target: These apps contain content suitable for young children.

trans-unit.source: There may be minimal comic violence in non-realistic, cartoon form.
trans-unit.target: There may be minimal comic violence in non-realistic, cartoon form.

trans-unit.source: Characters should not resemble or be associated with real life characters.
trans-unit.target: Characters should not resemble or be associated with real life characters.

trans-unit.source: There should be no content that could be frightening, and there should be no nudity or references to sexual or criminal activity.
trans-unit.target: There should be no content that could be frightening, and there should be no nudity or references to sexual or criminal activity.

trans-unit.source: Apps with this age rating also cannot enable features that could access content or functionality unsuitable for young children, such as uncontrolled online sharing of information (such as that described under the 12+ ratings category).
trans-unit.target: Apps with this age rating also cannot enable features that could access content or functionality unsuitable for young children, such as uncontrolled online sharing of information (such as that described under the 12+ ratings category).

trans-unit.source: 7+ (Suitable for ages 7 and older)
trans-unit.target: 7+ (Suitable for ages 7 and older)

trans-unit.source: Apps with this age rating have the same criteria as the 3+ applications, except these apps can include content that might frighten a younger audience and can contain partial nudity, as long as the nudity doesn't refer to sexual activity.
trans-unit.target: Apps with this age rating have the same criteria as the 3+ applications, except these apps can include content that might frighten a younger audience and can contain partial nudity, as long as the nudity doesn't refer to sexual activity.

trans-unit.source: This rating should only be used for apps where the content is suitable for children.
trans-unit.target: This rating should only be used for apps where the content is suitable for children.

trans-unit.source: 12+ (Suitable for ages 12 and older)
trans-unit.target: 12+ (Suitable for ages 12 and older)

trans-unit.source: Apps with this age rating can contain increased nudity of a non-sexual nature, slightly graphic violence towards non-realistic characters, or non-graphic violence towards realistic human or animal characters.
trans-unit.target: Apps with this age rating can contain increased nudity of a non-sexual nature, slightly graphic violence towards non-realistic characters, or non-graphic violence towards realistic human or animal characters.

trans-unit.source: This age rating might also include profanity, but not of a sexual nature.
trans-unit.target: This age rating might also include profanity, but not of a sexual nature.

trans-unit.source: Also, apps with this age rating or higher may allow for uncontrolled: (i) access to online social networks, or (ii) sharing of personal info with third parties, including other gamers or online acquaintances.
trans-unit.target: Also, apps with this age rating or higher may allow for uncontrolled: (i) access to online social networks, or (ii) sharing of personal info with third parties, including other gamers or online acquaintances.

trans-unit.source: (For such activity to be considered controlled, your app must include parental control features that require parental permission to use such sharing features, and you must identify those and explain their functionality in the [Notes for certification](notes-for-certification.md).)
trans-unit.target: (For such activity to be considered controlled, your app must include parental control features that require parental permission to use such sharing features, and you must identify those and explain their functionality in the [Notes for certification](notes-for-certification.md).)

trans-unit.source: 16+ (Suitable for ages 16 and older)
trans-unit.target: 16+ (Suitable for ages 16 and older)

trans-unit.source: Apps with this age rating can depict realistic violence with minimal blood, and they can depict sexual activity.
trans-unit.target: Apps with this age rating can depict realistic violence with minimal blood, and they can depict sexual activity.

trans-unit.source: They can also contain drug or tobacco use and criminal activities, and more profanity than would be allowed in a 12+ app, within the limits laid out in the Store Policies.
trans-unit.target: They can also contain drug or tobacco use and criminal activities, and more profanity than would be allowed in a 12+ app, within the limits laid out in the Store Policies.

trans-unit.source: 18+ (Suitable for adults)
trans-unit.target: 18+ (Suitable for adults)

trans-unit.source: Games with this age rating may contain intense, gross or specific violence, blood or gore which is only suitable for an adult audience.
trans-unit.target: Games with this age rating may contain intense, gross or specific violence, blood or gore which is only suitable for an adult audience.

trans-unit.source: All content must meet the [content policies](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn764944) criteria.
trans-unit.target: All content must meet the [content policies](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn764944) criteria.
